definition: phonetic component in certain characters with sound huò, such as 護, 獲, 穫 and 擭
to defend/to safeguard/to protect/to uphold/to maintain
to speak in defense of/to argue in favor of/to defend/to plead
to bless/to cherish/to take good care of/to conserve
to cherish/to treasure/to take care of/to love and protect

sentences.english: People drink realgar wine to protect themselves from illness.
sentences.chinese: 人們喝雄黃侍者護本身免於害病。

sentences.english: Dad always stuck up for you, you should do the same for him.
sentences.chinese: 爸總是“護”着你，你應該知恩圖報。

sentences.english: I glimpsed the dancer balancing herself on the ambulance by become.
sentences.chinese: 我掽巧瞥見舞蹈者在捄護車上使自己保持平衡。

sentences.english: Objective To analyze the function of Shoulder Belt Protector in preventing the dislocation of shoulder for brain apoplexy patients.
sentences.chinese: 目的探討護肩帶對腦卒中患者肩關節脫位的預防作用。

sentences.english: Specially contains the plant lip-care essence, which can make your lips more delicate, more charming and more attractive.
sentences.chinese: 特有植物護脣精華，使您的雙脣嬌嫩欲滴，楚楚動人。

sentences.english: Participants should bring their own sticks, mouth guard, shin pads.
sentences.chinese: 參加者需要自備球棍，牙箍，護脛。

sentences.english: God willed that Cosette's love should encounter one of the loves which save.
sentences.chinese: 上帝要珂賽特遇到的愛是那種護助人的愛。

sentences.english: You can even use latex gloves to cover your hands.
sentences.chinese: 你甚至可以使用乳膠手套護住手。

sentences.english: Green leaves protect safflower, the fragrant companion spring breeze of flower.
sentences.chinese: 綠葉護紅花，花香伴春風。

sentences.english: Gerasim opened one blind, and went out of the room on tiptoe.
sentences.chinese: 格拉西姆打開一扇護窗板，踮着足走出了書齋。

sentences.english: The invention has the characteristic of good protection effect for trees without the need of loosing ring frequently.
sentences.chinese: 具有護樹木效果好又無須經常松環的的特點。

sentences.english: There is guarding Lion of God and lotus carved at the stone baluster of the platform.
sentences.chinese: 桃臺石欄柱端刻有護天神獅及蓮花。

sentences.english: “The passport office is pretty expeditious when it comes to handling renewals,” Teddy said.
sentences.chinese: 在辦理展期方面，護照辦人員是很迅速的。

sentences.english: Conclusion Shoulder Belt Protector has a function of preventing the dislocation of shoulder for brain apoplexy patients.
sentences.chinese: 結論護肩帶對腦卒中患者肩關節脫位有預防作用。

sentences.english: Results The results of trainee nurse were better than trained with traditional way.
sentences.chinese: 結果實驗組護生出科成績明顯優於以往傳統教育學生。

sentences.english: Indulge in the sexy sweetness of this ultra - luxe body lotion.
sentences.chinese: 超奢華護體液提供性感甜蜜的享受。

definition: to defend/to safeguard/to protect/to uphold/to maintain
to agree (to do sth)/should/ought to/must/(legal) shall
to answer/to respond/to comply with/to deal or cope with
certificate/proof/to prove/to demonstrate/to confirm/variant of 症[zheng4]
after all/all in all/when all is said and done/in the final analysis
right/correct/couple/pair/towards/at/for/to face/opposite/to treat (sb a certain way)/to match together/to adjust/to fit/to suit/to answer/to reply/classifier: couple
regarding/as far as sth is concerned/with regards to
